text: Navid Negahban (; born June 2, 1968) is an Iranian-American actor. He has appeared on 24, Homeland, Mistresses and as Amahl Farouk / Shadow King in the second and third seasons of FX's Legion. He has also starred as The Sultan in the live-action remake of Aladdin. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:American movie actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Iranian movie actors Category:Actors from Mashhad
title: Navid Negahban
